name: Disco Zombie Rampage 2(with dj Trump)
description: Hack and Slash zombie tower defense rhytm game with wide arsenal of melee weapons and stationar towers. You play as young and cute girl Nastya. Your heart beats only when music is playing. Party zombies like your music too and will try to dance near DJ Trump. Zombies are so inaccurate and certainly will break audio system, so you must to defend it at all cost!
